channel.title: Application on Drum Machine Funk
channel.description: Recent content in Application on Drum Machine Funk

item.title: SL950
item.description: SL950 is an iPad and iPhone application that connects to your AKAI S950 sampler over a MIDI connection and let’s you edit all parameters of the programs and samples. Speed up your workflow by creating and generating keygroups and chopping up samples!

item.title: iDP/4
item.description: iDP/4 is an iPad application that connects to your Ensoniq DP/4 over a MIDI connection and let’s you edit all parameters of the 4 effect blocks as well as the routing between them.

item.title: Lahmacun Radio
item.description:
Lahmacun Radio is a Budapest-based online community radio station founded in 2018, showcasing the city’s various subcultures and musical scenes. The station’s studio is located in Kazán Community House, situated in District VIII, on the grounds of a former factory that now hosts numerous cultural and social projects.

Lahmacun Radio works not only with local but also international hosts, including contributors from Brussels, Edinburgh, Berlin, San Francisco, and Belgrade. Additionally, it collaborates with other online radio stations such as Radio Kapital from Poland, Cashmere Radio from Germany, and IDA Radio from Estonia.

item.title: Tilos Radio
item.description: Tilos Radio is a unique and independent radio station based in Budapest, Hungary, known for its progressive voice and community-oriented approach. Since its inception in the early 1990s, Tilos has championed freedom of speech, diversity of opinion, and artistic experimentation, making it a prominent alternative to mainstream media in the region. Originally broadcasting illegally as a pirate station, Tilos—meaning “forbidden” in Hungarian—has since evolved into a legal and widely respected platform for underground music, social commentary, and grassroots activism.
